description: Demolition of various outbuildings, front lift tower and rear glazed walkway and carry out works to provide 89 dwellings comprising refurbishment, alterations and conversion of former hospital (45 units), new linked extension (12 unit), detached court yard building (4 units), new apartments (26 units) and 2 detached houses. Works include rear dormers, remodelling of part of frontage, erection of new lift tower, plus ground works, cycling and refuse stores, 80 car spaces, hard and soft landscaping, ironwork gates and tree works.
